Story.description: In July 2021, Venezuelan entrepreneurs decided to bring their love for good food to Almer√≠a, giving life to Santa Monica. With a lighthouse as an emblem, this place not only seeks to be a gastronomic reference point, but also a space where world flavors merge with local ingredients. The lighthouse, present in its logo, symbolizes the light that guides burger lovers towards a unique experience, full of flavor and warmth.

About.title: About
About.2022: This year, Santa Monica begins its venture into the world of burgers. With a passion for food and a commitment to quality, our team embarks on a journey to create the best burgers in town.
About.2023: In 2023, Santa Monica establishes itself as a recognised name in the local dining scene. With a menu that combines classic and modern flavours, our guests enjoy a unique dining experience.
About.2024: In 2024, Santa Monica continues to innovate and expand its menu. With new recipes and collaborations with local chefs, we remain committed to offering the best in burgers.
About.2025: In 2025, Santa Monica celebrates its third anniversary. We thank our customers for their continued support and look forward to serving the best burgers in town for many years to come. <3

CookiesPolicy.title: Cookies Policy
CookiesPolicy.intro: This Cookies Policy explains what cookies are and how we use them at Santa Monica.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us improve your experience, remember your preferences, and understand how you use our site.

howWeUseCookies.title: How we use cookies
howWeUseCookies.essential: Essential cookies: Necessary for the basic functioning of the website.
howWeUseCookies.analytics: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site.
howWeUseCookies.preferences: Preference cookies: Remember your settings and preferences.
howWeUseCookies.marketing: Marketing cookies: Used to display relevant advertisements.

manageCookies.title: Managing cookies
manageCookies.description: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.
